Term.Name: Subtitle Dubbed Text
Term.Definition: The text of the sub-titles of a programme intended to be transmitted in synch with the programme, in a different language than that which is being spoken.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Subtitle Dubbed Text and Speaker

Term.Name: Subtitle and Speaker and Non-Speech Sound
Term.Definition: The text of the sub-titles of a programme intended to be transmitted in synch with the programme, in a different language than that which is being spoken. It includes the speacker recognition and the non-speech sound description for hard-hearing viewers.
